title: Why is KYS and %%%got not banable now?
body:
I got ban on my other account for quoting someone saying this to me.. 100% LEGIT! So why is it when I say to someone in Bronze 4 I can help them climb easy they reply You can kys easy also %%%got... I report them.

They still play.

I just had a game with someone that because my internet randomly dropped out I was a %%%got and I am gay and I am the solo reason for them losing... Still playing.

What is with this crap? I get ban for having a go at someone for saying KYS loser.. But people are now able to call people homophobic words and kill your self but never see any kind of ban!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
The easiest way to play this game is by muting both teams chats. 

I still don't get why you would say such words to begin with...  It may be unfortunate you got banned and they didn't, but surely they'll get banned. However, I've reported a couple dozen players via Riot support and they still aren't banned for being toxic. It's why I just mute everyone and play as I please. If they get mad at me, so what. 

I've hardly ever seen people talk properly in this game anymore. It's all "WHY DID YOU GANK" or "WHY DID YOU STEAL MY KILL" etc... 

Nobody appreciates anything anymore, on this specific server.

i have also noticed this from 3-4 weeks ago. 

Kinda annoyed that i have an account perma banned because of this and now some little child on school holidays has gotten away with this. Very poor by riot
Rarely as I see this behaviour, I'm still consistently seeing it punished. I'm not sure why your experience would be differing.

Neither but i can name the person and word for word repeat what they said.

after a report and and what not they are still very active and more than likely repeating what they are saying.

this is their OP.GG account. 

and I'll openly say this -

as toxic as i am, this person actually doesn't care about anything. this person is way more toxic than anything i have ever seen.
